title: Horror Music Pack - Fatally Wounded
description: 10 musical scores and ambient/atmospheric music for horror, suspense and thriller projects.
longDescription:
Watch product overview


10 musical scores and ambient music for horror, suspense and thriller games. They come in a wide variety of moods for every type of scene in a horror/suspense game, such as mystery, chase, a jump scare and other dramatic moments. Every song is looped, but there's variations, orchestral hits for jumpscares and stingers/leadups/buildups that you can use as a buildup for the song, or you can just fade them in, it's your choice.

The stingers and hits work with every song, since they more-or-less have the same instruments (below are the time signatures, next to the duration of the track).


The atmospheric sound of this album was mostly designed for horror/thriller projects and it features a wide selection of sound effects and frequencies, ranging from creaks, metallic noises and slams to bone-chilling strings and blaring brass. While mostly atmospheric and orchestral this score is ideal for psychological thrillers and horror games.


  • 1000 Razor Blades (Mysterious/Intense)

technicalDetails:
• 51 Cues total
  • 6 Orchestral hits/Jumpscares
  • 16 Stingers (each with a hit, ideal to start a song)
  • 26 different versions in total, each song has at least one version.
  • 140, 120, 110, 100 and 90 BPM tempos
  • Looped versions of each track
  • Most use more or less the same instruments and style
  • Royalty-free
